class.name: DiscordppCallInfoHandle
class.description:
Convenience class that represents the state of a single Discord call in a lobby.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1CallInfoHandle.html[/url]

method.name: ChannelId
method.description: Returns the lobby ID of the call.

method.name: GetParticipants
method.description: Returns a list of the user IDs of the participants in the call.

method.name: GetVoiceStateHandle
method.description: Accesses the voice state for a single user so you can know if they have muted or deafened themselves. Returns [DiscordppVoiceStateHandle] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: GuildId
method.description: Returns the lobby ID of the call.
